scenario_name: DataPulse Marketing Analytics Weekly Newsletter (Week of Nov 18 2025)
company_context: DataPulse Inc. is a mid‑size SaaS company (≈850 employees) that provides real‑time data‑visualization platforms for retail brands. The Marketing Analytics Team (15 members) sits in the Marketing Department and reports to the VP of Marketing, Maya Patel. The team produces a weekly internal newsletter to surface campaign performance, upcoming experiments, and cross‑team learnings for the broader Marketing organization (≈120 readers).
meeting_event_details: Newsletter publishing meeting – Friday, 15 Nov 2025, 10:30 AM – 11:00 AM (30 min) via Microsoft Teams (recorded). The meeting is used to confirm final copy, graphics, and distribution list before the newsletter goes live at 12:00 PM the same day. The next edition will be published Monday, 18 Nov 2025 at 12:00 PM.

stakeholders.name: Lena Gomez
stakeholders.responsibility: Collects contributions, writes editorial intro, assembles layout in Canva, and uploads final PDF to the internal portal.

stakeholders.name: Ravi Singh
stakeholders.responsibility: Reviews the 'Performance Snapshot' section for accuracy, validates charts, and ensures compliance with data‑privacy guidelines.

stakeholders.name: Maya Patel
stakeholders.responsibility: Gives final sign‑off on tone, strategic messaging, and any announcements that affect the whole Marketing org.

stakeholders.name: Jenna Lee
stakeholders.responsibility: Creates visual assets (header banner, infographics) and ensures brand guidelines are met.

stakeholders.name: Tom Alvarez
stakeholders.responsibility: Manages distribution list in the internal newsletter platform (Workplace by Meta) and tracks open‑rate metrics.

deliverables: Weekly Newsletter PDF (2‑page, 1,200 words max) ready for upload by 12:00 PM Friday, 15 Nov 2025.
Accompanying HTML version for the intranet portal (optional, for accessibility).
Performance Snapshot data file (Excel) with source links attached for reviewer reference.
Distribution report template (pre‑filled with recipient list) for Tom to upload.
Post‑publish analytics deck (open rate, click‑through, feedback) to be shared in the next Monday stand‑up.
success_criteria: Newsletter published on schedule (by 12:00 PM Friday).
Zero data‑accuracy errors flagged by the reviewer.
Brand‑compliance score ≥ 95 % (checked against the internal brand checklist).
Open rate ≥ 78 % of the Marketing org and click‑through on at least one featured link ≥ 30 %.
All stakeholder sign‑offs captured in the shared Teams channel before the publishing meeting.
constraints: T‑7 planning horizon – all content must be submitted to Lena by 12:00 PM Thursday, 14 Nov 2025.
Budget: No external design tools may be purchased; only Canva Enterprise (already licensed) can be used.
Data privacy: Any customer‑level data must be aggregated to the campaign level before inclusion.
Dependency: Ravi’s review cannot start until the raw performance data file is uploaded to the shared OneDrive folder (deadline 9:00 AM Thursday).
Technical: The newsletter platform only accepts PDFs under 2 MB; graphics must be optimized accordingly.
workback_prompt: Generate a detailed workback plan for the 'DataPulse Marketing Analytics Weekly Newsletter (Week of Nov 18 2025)' scenario. Include all tasks, owners, start/end dates, and dependencies, working backwards from the final publishing deadline of Friday, 15 Nov 2025 at 12:00 PM. Account for the T‑7 planning horizon, stakeholder sign‑offs, data‑privacy checks, and the constraints listed.
